mapper.sql: object_id AS "objectId" , table_object_id AS "tableObjectId" , data_definition_object_id AS "dataDefinitionObjectId" , object_code AS "objectCode" , object_name AS "objectName" , object_comment AS "objectComment" , object_order AS "objectOrder" , nullable AS "nullable" , is_pk AS "isPk" , operators AS "operators" , system_code AS "systemCode" , version AS "version" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dic_column ( object_id, table_object_id, data_definition_object_id, object_code, object_name, object_comment, object_order, nullable, is_pk, operators, system_code, version, create_date, update_date, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{objectId}, #{tableObjectId}, #{dataDefinitionObjectId}, #{objectCode}, #{objectName}, #{objectComment}, #{objectOrder}, #{nullable}, #{isPk}, #{operators}, #{systemCode}, #{version}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteDate} )
